articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: NASA’s next Moonship reaches last stop before launch pad - Ars Technica
articles.description: Preparations for the Artemis II mission continue despite the federal government shutdown.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: WhatsApp will curb the number of messages people and businesses can send without a response - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company said the controls are designed to be effective against people and businesses that blast messages and spam people.
articles.content:
WhatsApp is attempting to solve its spam problem by curbing how many messages individual users and businesses can send to unknown people without getting a response.
While the app started as an easy … [+2152 chars]
